channel.title: 10 HP pure
channel.description:
Hello fellow MoparScapers.
I've been working on a 10 HP pure for the past 4 days, its stats are as follows:
32 combat 59 range 12 magic 10 HP
I'm planning on getting 60 range and magic; Dark Bow rushing, etc.
How would I train magic quickest and most efficiently without leveling HP?
(50m to use, btw.)
Thanks.

item.title: 10 HP pure
item.dc:creator: @RustJR RustJR
item.description:
@RustJR wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:20, topic:367980”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=464124.msg3396219#msg3396219 date=1289421441]
It is quite difficult, especially since RSBots is down atm.
[/quote]
Oh… Looks like I was right. Well, still good luck mate.[/quote]

Well stop with the “SARAISM” becuase it’s not apprioprate for this, why don’ you go and figure it out.

Read full topic

item.title: 10 HP pure
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

i have an ax:

I don’t understand. How would you D-Bow rush without gaining HP?

Of course some XP will be gained…

laurent 248:

wear a black armor and autocast airstrike on a rat. U wont hit and u’ll level up.

Nty, I high alch.

[quote=“Squirt Ltd, post:47, topic:367980”][quote author=EMINEM BEAST™ link=topic=464124.msg3400737#msg3400737 date=1289888021]

I superheated on my 9Hp pure, its now 86 mage
[/quote]9hp pure? is that even posable?

Yeah, when you started your acc in runescape classic.

I think it was due different xp rates in rs2 or something…[/quote]
Yep, 9 HP ftw.

@topic: It’s not 10 HP anymore; decided to just make it into a SW prod. Hopefully.

Read full topic

item.title: 10 HP pure
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

[quote=“Spencer4678, post:36, topic:367980”]This may be a stupid question, but what is the point of having a 10 HP pure?
Just to show off or is there some advantage to it?[/quote]

Cuz having the skill capes for Mage and Range at level 50 combat looks pretty sick ;D

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

I understand the concept of dbow rushing as you will get an instance kill, but what I don’t understand is how do you handle pjers as they will hit you once and kill you

Of course I’ve taken that into consideration. At my level, players rarely hit 200, which will be my LP with the ingestion of a rocktail.

item.title: 10 HP pure
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:31, topic:367980”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=464124.msg3396849#msg3396849 date=1289516524]

This is fucking pointless…

gtfopls.

Wow wait what the fuck? You now have a choice weather to level hp or not?

No, there are methods to obtain skills without leveling HP.

Aww kool for realz? Man that is tight. I didn’t even know that hahaha.

Its been like that since like 06.

I feel really dumb now
I didn’t even know that you could control by not leveling some skills
[/quote]
Dwarf Multi-Cannon doesn’t level HP. Neither does high level alchemy, etc…[/quote]

Oh never thought of that. by the way, why would you want only 10hp just wanderin?

Read full topic
